introduce_product: From BABY-G, the fashionable and tough casual watch for active women, comes a new model produced in collaboration with "beautiful people," a high-end fashion brand from Japan that constantly strives to redefine the meaning of beauty while maintaining a high level of craftsmanship. Though BABY-G and "beautiful people" are in different fields and appeal to different tastes, this new collaboration model blends their creative talents to create a stunning new timepiece.
